item.title: Sorry for the noise\...
item.description: I’ve just recently started migrating my blog to Tumblr, and in the process of importing my archives from WordPress I seem to have caused some issues with certain aggregators that are now picking up posts from 2007… Yesterday I also triggered a massive torrent on both Twitter and Facebook… Please accept my apologies for the incovenience… more on the Tumblr migration to follow!
